entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon. Snow level rising to 1400 metres this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Snow level lowering to 1000 metres this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
